resources

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ResourceManger class manages all transactions other packages need to make concerning resources.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Jan, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter

    • Method Detail

      • tradeWithPlayer

        public void tradeWithPlayer(ResourceList resList,
                            int toPlayerIndex,
                            int fromPlayerIndex)
        Parameters:
        resLists - This is an ResourceList where the positive numbers in the arrays are the resources going to one player and the negative numbers are coming from another player.
        toPlayerIndex - The index of the player who is receiving the positive numbered resources.
        fromPlayerIndex - The index of the player who is receiving the negative numbered resources.

      • tradeWithBank

        public void tradeWithBank(ResourceList resList,
                          int toPlayerIndex)
        Parameters:
        resList - ResourceList with the positive numbers going to the player and the negative numbers coming from the Bank.
        toPlayerIndex - The index of the player who is trading with the bank.

      • buyRoad

        public void buyRoad(int playerIndex)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is buying a road.

      • buySettlement

        public void buySettlement(int playerIndex)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is buying a settlement.

      • buyCity

        public void buyCity(int playerIndex)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is buying a city.

      • buyDevCard

        public void buyDevCard(int playerIndex)
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player who is buying a development card.

      • generateResources

        public void generateResources()
        This is the external call for generating resources for the CatanModel.
